so_22714524: find . -type d -name n10 \
  -exec bash -c '
     for arg; do
       cp "$arg"/* "${arg%/*}"
     done
  ' _ {} +

ul_484961: for dir in */*; do
  if [[ -d "$dir" ]]; then
    ( 
      cd "$dir"
      mv -n * ..
      cd ..
      rmdir "$( basename "$dir" )"
    )
  fi
done
